answers.answer: Hello,Nausea when hungry and its going away after consuming food may be due to hypoglycemia.Try to take some healthy snacks in between the meals at frequent intervals and also try not to deprive yourself of food for long.If the symptoms persist then diabetes can be a possibility for which I sincerely advise you to get your blood sugar evaluated.I hope that helps. Please do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional queries. Kind regards.

question: When I am extremely hungry, I get nauseus feeling.  It goes away when I eat, but sometimes it hard to even get myself to eat, because I am hungry.  What could be the cause for this?  I am a 20 year old female.  My dad is hypoglycemic, could that have an influence on this? Thanks.
title: Nausea when hungry
